entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
